descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff00ff][size=4] I am a newcomer, also please support, thank you.[/size]
[size=4]     To tell the truth, the original plan is going to be a nurse, or legal career.But think later, mammy embarrassed, feel useless is not very big.And I also don't like law profession, even play up to now, I also never choose a wizard.No matter what game I played only physics class.But this after, the first impression is likely to give you the illusion.
[/size][/color][/b]   [b][color=#ff00ff][size=4] waner -- -- -- -- -- - she is a soldier, fight way: one hand, both hands, bow and arrow.
[/size][/color][/b]    [b][size=4][color=#ff00ff]But waner parents are senior mage fort was winter, so her father also hope she can be a great mage, but waner seems don't have any interest to spell, so until now she didn't learn any spell, it is studied some physical fight way quietly.Although it might seem don't like to have a pair of soldier's appearance, but has a heart warriors as blood.All attack will be some department of physics, how to get to see you.[/color]

[color=#ff00ff]Name:waner[/color]
